original_title: Rafael Cancel Miranda: I'm not sorry for what I did
overview: Explores the trajectory of the young nationalist from the time of his incarceration, at 23 years of age, as a result of the attack on the United States Congress.

production_companies.name: Unidad de Cine y TV de la Universidad de Puerto Rico (UCTV)

title: Rafael Cancel Miranda: I'm not sorry for what I did
